name: mumbai-trails-monorepo
description: MumbAI Trails - Discover Mumbai with AI-powered itineraries

scripts.test:all: pnpm run test:backend && pnpm run test:frontend && pnpm run test:e2e
scripts.lint:frontend: cd frontend && pnpm run lint || echo 'Frontend lint not configured'
scripts.install:all: pnpm install --frozen-lockfile=false || (cd backend && pnpm install) && (cd frontend && pnpm install) && (cd tests/e2e && npm install)
